************
Blibox CLI
************


Project goal
============

``blibox-cli.sh`` is a simple and conveniant bash script. It consists of multiple grep and sed
in order to easily change the ``.env`` configuration of blibox and also a shorthand to start the
containers. It has been validated with shellcheck.


Project details
===============

* **Project:** https://github.com/louisgab/blibox-cli
* **Mirror:** https://github.com/blibox/blibox-cli
